title: NWR Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 2162 Apprentices Posts
description: The North Western Railway (NWR) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 2162 Apprentice Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th pass and ITI can apply for the NWR Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and h...
